author: Anonymous Helix
title: Local lifted definitions containing expressions
question:
If I had a function
(define (foo x loy)
  (local [(define (fn x)
            (+ x (first loy))]
    (fn x)))
and I called 
(foo 3 (list 1 4 5 2))
, is the correct lifted definition
(define (fn_0 x)
  (+ x (first (list 1 4 5 2))))
where (first (list 1 4 5 2)) is kept as an expression or is it
(define (fn_0 x)
  (+ x 1))
where (first (list 1 4 5 2)) is evaluated to a value?
instructor_answer: what happens when you try this with the stepper?
